metadata.title: CVE-2020-13294 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In GitLab before 13.0.12, 13.1.6 and 13.2.3, access grants were not revokedwhen a user revoked access to an application.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
